name: Brain Store
description:
Description

Brain Store is a restaurant business simulator in a zombie setting. The goal of the game is to earn as much money as possible. Disassemble the human body into organs and organize an ingredient storage system so that you have enough products, combining which you can create dishes for restaurant customers!

Plot

In the year 2100, humanity has become completely online. People transferred their consciousness to the global network and left their real bodies. At the same time, an unknown virus made people died in the last decade rise from their graves and stumble upon an infinite number of abandoned human bodies. This incident was called Brain Storm.

Since all humanity now live online, the planet has become completely owned by zombies who have adjusted their daily lives. A few years after the Brain Storm, the Brain Store restaurant for zombies was opened. The business is very profitable: because of the abundance of human corpses, they are very cheap. And now you have a unique opportunity to work as a chef in this restaurant full of undead clients!
